title: RR hostel wifi
content: How do I get full access to internet. Every major sites have been blocked.I had brought surfshark but even that vpn has been blocked

comments.body: Welcome to PES lmao. I think people have discussed a list of hacks on discord (this is asked every year so you will find all the answers there). You can find them if you join the server.
This was blocked a longgggg ago
Hi, the links in the faq doesnt seem to work, is there any alternate way to join?
Use your mobile data to go to entertainment sites. They want to control use to anything academic thats all. Sucks I know.
Not to offend but , how could you expect mobile data in hostel it's all too slow
Short of finding an apartment and setting up wifi, you have no chance.
